summary: An email forwarded to Mark L. Epstein, likely from an unknown sender, containing a threatening message. The sender claims to have prepared a message with the content of several documents to send to media outlets, references Mark's access to his brother's money, and mentions finding information from his computer including communications with two female models.

persons.name: Mark L. Epstein
persons.role: Email recipient, brother of Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email is addressed to him, and the sender references his access to his brother's money and information found from his computer.

persons.name: Falacey Richman
persons.context: Appears as a recipient in the email header.

connections.description: Mark L. Epstein is referred to as the brother of Jeffrey Epstein in the context of accessing his money.

events.title: Threatening email sent to Mark L. Epstein
events.description: An unknown sender prepares to send a message containing the content of several documents to twenty media outlets and news agencies, threatening to reveal information found from Mark L. Epstein's computer.

keyFacts: An unknown sender threatens to release information to media outlets targeting Mark L. Epstein.
The sender references Mark L. Epstein's access to his brother Jeffrey Epstein's money.
The sender claims to have found information from Mark L. Epstein's computer, including communications with two female models.
